rtrainHelp: /rtrain - táº·ng N coins cho nhá»¯ng ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng retweet má»™t tweet If no retweets target is specified - first call of rtrain will only start retweets counter. In this case second call with same tweet link will perform rain by already collected retweets list. If retweets target = 0 - rtarain runs immediately. If retweets target was set in previous command, and new command have target = 0 - rtarain runs immediately, and all other targets are ignored, retweets collection stops. If no targets was specified or all targets reached - retweets collection stops.
